Description:
Awesome, awesome wood and marble board game. I don't know what this game is called, but it's the one where you jump marbles and take the jumped marbles off. The goal is to have one marble left on the board. You can only jump forward, backwards, left and right. What's cool is you put the marbles in the little hidden compartments. One of the doors to the compartments in sharded. This one was made by Berea College Crafts at Berea College in Berea, Kentucky. There is a faint wood burning on the bottom that barely says Berea College, Berea, KY. Marbles not included.
7.5" square

Product name: Little helper tower / table / chair all-in-one, Montessori learning stool, kitchen step stool
Description:
Little helper tower / step stool for toddler which can be easily converted to table and chair.
After helping mom in the kitchen to peel potatoes and prepare dinner, little helper can be tired. Helper tower can be easily converted to table and chair, so little helper can take a rest, or have some fun with the toys, or maybe enjoy just prepared dinner at his own table!
Please, see the video on how surdy the stools are. Everybody deserves their own helper tower - https://youtu.be/5CG_kI5VJ-s
To see how the learning tower can be folded into table / chair, see this video: https://youtu.be/uWjQpH1_Nms
Little helper convertible step stool / table / chair:
 handmade from 15mm (0.59'') birch plywood, so stable and hardy to hold a toddler;
 Treated with water based lacquer or colored with water based paint, so no chemistry and kid's safe!
 Dimensions - learning tower overall height 90cm (35.43''), step platform just in the middle 45cm (17.72'') height. Platform dimensions - 28 x 40 cm (11.02'' x 15.75'').
 Learning / helper tower easily bends in the middle and converts to table and chair;
 Safe locks at the side secures both learning tower and table / chair positions;
 Very comfortable in limited living spaces - you don't need to find a space for learning / helper tower, table and chair separately. All-in-one!
 The wallet will be satisfied as well - it is much more economical than buying learning / helper tower, table and chair separately :)

Description:
Relieve insomnia with Surrender Sleep Oil, made from pure plant based ingredients in my Sacred Kitchen. I reiki vibrate Pure Grape Seed Oil infused with Lavender Arils, Organic Local Cold Pressed Olive Oil, Pure Lavender Vetiver EO, Amethyst, Black Tourmaline & Love. This infusion is made to be massaged on the palms of hands and the palms of feet before bed to enhance calm and serene sleep. {This listing is for one, 4 ounce glass amber bottle} {VEGAN and Naturally GLUTEN FREE} 
°•Lavender Essential Oil Benefits
 Lavender essential oil induces sleep which has made it a common recommendation for an alternative treatment of insomnia. 
°•Vetiver Essential Oil Benefits
Vetiver essential oil has been traditionally used for alleviating emotional stress, nervousness, panic attacks, trauma, anxiety, insomnia, hysteria, debility and depression. The sedative, strengthening, tonic and nervine properties of this oil make it the perfect natural choice for assisting problems associated with the mind. It stabilizes the mind, strengthens the nervous system, tranquilizes the mind and body, rejuvenates the entire system, boosts the immune power and induces peaceful sleep. 
Thank you & Namaste •
*{Please consult your doctor before you use any essential oils if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.}

Description:
Vintage Shoes, Mens Vintage Shoes, Bruno Di Veroli, Leather Dress Shoes
Quality mens black leather dress shoes, made by Bruno Di Veroli in Sydney, Australia. Very good condition - no rips, stains or marks. There is a small amount of wear on the inside heel - that just means that these shoes were well loved!
